pull.title: wallet: Add missing cs_db lock
pull.body:
Without this lock `BerkeleyEnvironment::~BerkeleyEnvironment` and `GetWalletEnv` would race for `g_dbenvs`. This wasn't detected before because thread safety analysis does not check constructors
and destructors.

Reference: http://releases.llvm.org/5.0.2/tools/clang/docs/ThreadSafetyAnalysis.html#no-checking-inside-constructors-and-destructors

events.message:
wallet: Add missing cs_db lock

Without this lock BerkeleyEnvironment::~BerkeleyEnvironment and
GetWalletEnv would race for g_dbenvs. This wasn't detected before
because thread safety analysis does not check constructors and
destructors.

events.body:
@practicalswift is this correct?

@ryanofsky please take a look too.
utACK 712d35bc563ac7de0b7dfc3a35fc48dc6448fa6a. Would be nice if there was a (unit) test that run into problems with tsan.

utACK 712d35bc563ac7de0b7dfc3a35fc48dc6448fa6a

Good catch!

Could be similar issues in other constructors/destructors.

> ... race for g_dbenvs. This wasn't detected before because thread safety analysis does not check constructors and destructors.

A solution to that would be to require that constructors don't access globals in their body. Calling a function that does it for them would be fine, since that is covered by the static analyser.

issue.title: Bitcoin 0.18 locking PRs
issue.body:
These are locking changes from upstream (bitcoin core) release 0.18 (Aug 13, 2018, to Mar 3, 2019), oldest to newest (when merged to the master branch).

UPDATE 2021-May-4: This PR is complete, ready for review.

NOTE: This PR's branch is based on #5034, which hasn't merged yet, so its commits appear here also. For the current PR, please review only commit "Add missing locks and locking annotations for CAddrMan" and beyond (I will remove this comment before this PR gets merged.)

Each commit also includes a reference both to the PR and the upstream commit.

- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13115
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14444
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11634
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13123
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14953
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14993
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12151
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12153
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15322
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15321
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15201
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15365
